dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3004 IH: To amend the Gullah/Geechee Cultural Heritage Act to extend the authorization for the Gullah/Geechee Cultural Heritage Corridor Commission.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Clyburn introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Gullah/Geechee Cultural Heritage Act to extend the authorization for the Gullah/Geechee Cultural Heritage Corridor Commission.

section.header: Extension of the authorization for the Gullah/Geechee Cultural Heritage Corridor Commission
section.text: Section 295D(d) of the Gullah/Geechee Cultural Heritage Act (Public Law 109â€“338; 120 Stat. 1833; 16 U.S.C. 461 note) is amended by striking 10 years and inserting 15 years.
